archiefmat.titel: Correspondentie van E.G. Veldwijk, 1e raad-fiscaal te Paramaribo, met diverse personen te Londen, Amsterdam etc. Uittreksels (machineschrift) met dubbelen
archiefmat.titel_eng: Correspondence of E.G. Veldwijk, first Councillor-fiscal, with various persons in London, Amsterdam, etc. Abstracts and copies
archiefmat.notes: See also nos. 1851 and 1866 of the Collection of acquisitions of the former First Section (HaNA, inv.no. 1.11.01.01).
